posts.post_content: I acquired a large lot of SGC graded cards and am making some available for sale. You can see the cards at the link below which also has prices. Cards are graded between SGC 10 and SGC 55.

[quote name="Thromdog" post=1764802]I acquired a large lot of SGC graded t205 cards and am making some available for sale. You can see the cards at the link below which also has prices. Cards are graded between SGC 10 and SGC 55.

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/thromdog/t205[/url]

Lots of commons, some nice HOFers, a couple of MLers. A good mix of cards.  Prices are negotiable too, of course....especially if buying multiple cards

If you see anything you want or need, just let me know. I accept paypal and money orders with shipment on receipt of payment. I will also be listing these on eBay over the next few days.

Thanks for looking![/QUOTE]
